item.description:
Come spend a warm summer's night on the water as we take a 3 hour boat ride......

dancing the night away to Don't Call Me Shirley!!!!!

 

6.9.12 LAST UPDATE (promise): I spoke to them at Newburyport Whale Watch you will need to call & pay for your ticket ahead of time and as of Friday 6.8 there were approx 80+ tickets left, some people tend to call at the last minute, so if you are one of those last minute callers note that last year they were selling tickets on the date of the cruise but it is not guaranteed a ticket and there are no refunds.

FOOD: They won't be serving any food on the boat, you can bring anything that you want, just no alcohol.

 

UPDATE: I changed the meeting time for this event (now 6:15) that will give us time to get our tickets and then head over to the boat.  They will start boarding at 6:30 and the boat will be leaving at 7:00.

Boats course: This boat will be slowly cruising up and down Newburyport’s Harbor, out to Plum Island and then to the bridges into Amesbury and back.

To get your ticket: Go to Newburyport Whale watch and pay for it there, then you can get on the boat.

 

I am sure this will sell out, so don't be left out and get your ticket today.  Please remember to come back o the Meetup site and let me know if you got your ticket so we look for you.


To get your ticket: Call Newburyport Whale Watch for tickets 1 (800) 848-1111, OR take your chance at the gate.


Cost: $20.00 each

(NOTE: You are responsible to get your own ticket)


Other information you need to know: Cash bar (no dinner)

The boat leaves at 7:00!

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Looking forward to dancing with you on the boat!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the boat, come on and meet us there.
item.name: Boat Cruise with Don't Call Me Shirley
